languages.text: "Давай отложим этот разговор до более удобного момента? Я здесь по указанию Лорд-инквизитора — мне предписано благополучно доставить его аколита на Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "Давай отложим этот разговор до более удобного момента? Я здесь по указанию Лорда-инквизитора — мне предписано благополучно доставить его аколита на Футфол".

languages.text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Давай отложим этот разговор до более удобного момента? Я здесь по указанию Лорд-инквизитора — мне предписано благополучно доставить его аколита на Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "Can this conversation wait until a more opportune moment? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival at Footfall."
"Can this conversation wait until a more opportune moment? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival at Footfall."
"Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."
"Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."
"Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

languages.text: “这个话题能不能等到更合适的时候再谈？我奉大审判官的命令来到这里，负责保护他的侍仆人身安全，保证你能及时抵达落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “这个话题能不能等到更合适的时候再谈？我奉审判长的命令来到这里，负责保护他的侍仆人身安全，保证你能及时抵达落脚港。”

languages.text: 「この会話はまたの機会にしよう。{mf|俺|私}はロード・インクィジターの命令でここに来たのだ。彼のアコライトが、フットフォールに安全かつ時間通りに到着できるように」
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「この会話はまたの機会にしよう。私はロード・インクィジターの命令でここに来たのだ。彼のアコライトが、フットフォールに安全かつ時間通りに到着できるように」

languages.text: "Können wir dieses Gespräch zu einem besseren Zeitpunkt führen? Ich bin hier auf Befehl des Großinquisitors und soll dafür sorgen, dass sein Akolyth sicher und rechtzeitig nach Footfall gelangt."
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Können wir dieses Gespräch zu einem besseren Zeitpunkt führen? Ich bin hier auf Befehl des Großinquisitors und soll dafür sorgen, dass sein Akolyth sicher und rechtzeitig nach Footfall gelangt."

languages.text: « Ne pourrions-nous pas remettre cette conversation à un moment plus propice ? Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargé de veiller à ce que son acolyte soit transporté rapidement et en toute sécurité à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Ne pourrions-nous pas remettre cette conversation à un moment plus propice ? Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargé de veiller à ce que son acolyte soit transporté rapidement et en toute sécurité à Castel. »

languages.text: «¿Podemos hablar en otro momento? He venido por orden del Lord Inquisidor para llevar a su acólito sano y salvo hasta Paso cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «¿Podemos hablar en otro momento? He venido por orden del Lord Inquisidor para llevar a su acólito sano y salvo hasta Paso cuanto antes».

languages.text: "Bu konuşmayı daha münasip bir zamana mı bıraksak? Lord Engizisyoncu'nun emriyle, havarisinin Binliman'a sağ salim ve zamanında varmasını sağlamak için buradayım."
languages.original_text: "Can this conversation wait for a better time? I'm here on the Lord Inquisitor's orders, to see to his acolyte's safe and timely arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuşmayı daha münasip bir zamana mı bıraksak? Lord Engizisyoncu'nun emriyle, havarisinin Binliman'a sağ salim ve zamanında varmasını sağlamak için buradayım."
